replying_person:
Steven A. Mack
Director
National Commodity Specialist Division
product_description: The sample, identified by the retail packaging as "Blankets 3-Piece Set," consists of three baby blankets which you state are made from 66 percent polyester, 29 percent rayon and 5 percent spandex. Two of the blankets are made of printed, lightweight, finely knit jersey fabric. One blanket is printed with a leaf motif and the other is printed with a dinosaur and leaf motif. The third blanket is made from dyed, lightweight, waffle knit fabric. The edges of the three blankets are finished with an overlock stitch and the corners are rounded. Each blanket measures approximately 30 X 40 inches.
